item.title: Crown Help! Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

Here is my crown thing for a donator

} else if(byte0 == 4) {
									modIcons[3].drawSprite(xPos + 1+i13, yPos - 12+i12);
									xPos += 14;
								}

it is if they have 4 player rights and 4+ rights on my server = admin :/, when i make it 0 the crown shos up for everyone. any idea how i can change byte0(rights) to memberstatus?

Read full topic
